description: This land of Ballia is a revolutionary land. This land gave us Mangal Pandey. People from here give their lives to the nation: PM — PMO India (@PMOIndia) May 1, 2016 We h
caption: n-m4.in
message:
Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana will greatly benefit the poor, especially poor women & will also improve their health. 

Our Govt has shown how the petroleum sector works for the poor. It is important that across sectors, fruits of progress reach the poor. http://n-m4.in/1X1bO31
